name: Lost and Steal
description:
Lost and Steal

Finders keepers, losers weepers

Game made for the global game jam 2021

Gather the desired items (top left) within the time limit by taking it from wandering people. Make sure the cops don't catch you!

Controlles
  • Left click - Stun cops with party popper
  • Right  click - Pick up item / throw item
  • Space - Jump
  • Left shift - Sprint
  • Left ctrl - Crouch
Developers

Andrés - Art, particles and characters -Itch.io Twitter

Maxim - Programming and gameplay logic - Itch.io Twitter

Briek - Modeled hat, comb and lolly - Itch.io Twitter
